Indian Economy.title: Mint Quick Edit | India is a top-four economy: Now let’s tackle the bigger challenges we face
Indian Economy.summary: As India joins the big GDP league, China’s ascent is what we must compare our progress with; after all, it holds geopolitical and economic policy implications. The key is to learn the right lessons and address weaknesses we won’t be able to resolve later.

Indian Economy.title: Goldilocks phase, reforms glide path to spur Indian economy in 2026
Indian Economy.summary: India, the world's fourth largest economy, is set to maintain the 'goldilocks' phase with tailwinds of good growth, low inflation and robust banking performance as well as reform initiatives poised to sustain the economic pace witnessed during 2025.

Indian Economy.title: We cannot afford any complacency: Even a new year free of shake-ups would test our resolve

Indian Economy.title: Trump and the end of American hegemony
